              def default_serializer_options

              def default_serializer_options

          6

      13.

              def create
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          3
          
                params[:source].merge!(partner_id: params[:partner_id])

          3

      16.

          1

              def reindex

          1

              def link_check_records
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          2
          
                @source = Source.find(params[:id])
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          2
          
                @records = []
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          2
          
                @records += first_two_records(@source.source_id, :oldest).map(&:source_url)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          2
          
                @records += first_two_records(@source.source_id, :latest).map(&:source_url)
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          2
          
                render json: @records.to_json
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
              private
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
              def first_two_records(source_id, direction)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          2
          
                sort = direction == :latest ? -1 : 1
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          2
          
                records = Record.where("fragments.source_id" => source_id, :status => 'active').sort("fragments.syndication_date" => sort)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          2
          
                records.limit(2).to_a
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
            end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          end

              def solr_up?
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          4
          
                begin
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          4
          
                  resource = RestClient.get ENV['SOLR_PING'], open_timeout: 5
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          2
          
                  success = Hash.from_xml(resource)['response']['str'] == "OK"
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          2
          
                  Support::StatusLogger.logger.error("Solr ping command not successful. Ping output: #{Hash.from_xml(resource)['response']}") unless success
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          2
          
                  success
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          2
          
                rescue StandardError => e
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          2
          
                  Support::StatusLogger.logger.error("Exception when attempting to ping Solr. Exception is #{e}.\nBacktrace #{e.backtrace[0..2].join("\n")}")
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          2
          
                  false
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
              def mongod_up?
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          3
          
                begin
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          3
          
                  session = Record.collection.database.session
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          3
          
                  success = session.command(ping: 1)['ok'] == 1
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  Support::StatusLogger.logger.error("MongoDB ping command not successful. Ping output: #{session.command(ping: 1)}") unless success
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                  success
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          2
          
                rescue StandardError => e
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          2
          
                  Support::StatusLogger.logger.error("Exception when attempting to ping MongoDB. Exception is #{e}.\nBacktrace #{e.backtrace[0..2].join("\n")}")
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          2
          
                  false
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                end    
        
      68.

              end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69.

              def serializable_array(user_sets, options={})
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          6
          
                options.reverse_merge!(root: false, items: false, user: false, total: false)

    81. 
          6
          
                hash = {"sets" => []}
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          6
          
                user_sets.each do |set|
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                  hash["sets"] << UserSetSerializer.new(set, options).as_json
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          6
          
                hash["total"] = UserSet.public_sets_count if options[:total]
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          6
          
                hash
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              end
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
          
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1

      90.

    91.

      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
          
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
              def extract_range(value)
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          3
          
                if value.match(/^\[(\d+)\sTO\s(\d+)\]$/)
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
                  $1.to_i..$2.to_i
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                else
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          2
          
                  value.to_i > 0 ? value.to_i : value.strip
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                end
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
              end
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
          
        
      201.

          1
          
              def to_proper_value(name, value)
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          29
          
                return false if value == 'false'
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          26
          
                return true if value == 'true'
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          20
          
                return nil if ['nil', 'null'].include?(value)
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
            
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          17
          
                value = value.strip if value.is_a?(String)
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          17
          
                value
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              end
        
      209.

      210.

              # Downcase all queries before sending to SOLR, except queries

      212. 
      
        
    212.

      213.

              def text
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          47
          
                @text = options[:text]
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          47
          
                if @text.present? && !@text.match(/:\"/)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          11
          
                  @text.downcase!
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          15
          
                  @text.gsub!(/ and | or | not /) {|op| op.upcase}
        
      218. 
      
        
    218.

      219.

                @text

              def offset
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                (page * per_page) - per_page
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
              end
        
      225.

      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
              def facets_offset
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          4
          
                offset = (facets_page * facets_per_page) - facets_per_page
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          4
          
                offset < 0 ? 0 : offset
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
              end
        
      230.

              def execute_solr_search

              def execute_solr_search_and_handle_errors(search)
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          50
          
                begin
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          50
          
                  self.errors ||= []
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          50
          
                  sunspot = search.execute
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          5
          
                rescue RSolr::Error::Http => e
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          2
          
                  self.errors << self.solr_error_message(e)
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          2
          
                  Rails.logger.info e.message
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          2
          
                  sunspot = {}
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
                rescue Timeout::Error, Errno::ECONNREFUSED, Errno::ECONNRESET => e
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          3
          
                  self.errors << 'Solr is temporarily unavailable please try again in a few seconds.'
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          3
          
                  Rails.logger.info e.message
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          3
          
                  sunspot = {}
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          
          
                ensure
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          50
          
                  return sunspot
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          50
          
                end
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          
          
              end
        
      336. 
      
        
    336.

          1
          
              private
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          
          
            
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          
          
              # Generates the :and and :or conditions for a search object
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          
          
              #
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          1
          
              def build_conditions
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          45
          
                Proc.new do
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          43
          
                  {and: options[:and], or: options[:or]}.each do |operator, value|
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          86
          
                    Utils.call_block(self, &recurse_conditions(operator, value))
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
                  end
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
                end
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          
          
              end
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          
          
            
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          
          
              # Detects when the key is a operator (:and, :or) and calls itself
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          
          
              # recursively until it finds facets defined in Sunspot.
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          
          
              #
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          1
          
              def recurse_conditions(key, conditions, current_operator=:and)
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          116
          
                Proc.new do
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          116
          
                  case key.to_sym
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          
          
                  when :and
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          45
          
                    all_of do
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          45
          
                      conditions.each do |filter,value|
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          21
          
                        Utils.call_block(self, &recurse_conditions(filter,value, :and))
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          
          
                      end
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          
          
                    end
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          
          
                  when :or
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          44
          
                    any_of do
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          44
          
                      conditions.each do |filter,value|
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          9
          
                        Utils.call_block(self, &recurse_conditions(filter,value, :or))
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          
          
                      end
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          
          
                    end
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          
          
                  else
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          27
          
                    Utils.call_block(self, &filter_values(key, conditions, current_operator))
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          
          
                  end
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          
          
                end
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          
          
              end
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          
          
            
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          
          
              # Generates a single condition. It can take a operator to
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          
          
              # determine how the values within the filter are going to be
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          
          
              # joined.
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
              #
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          1
          
              def filter_values(key, conditions, current_operator=:and)
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          27
          
                Proc.new do
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          27
          
                  if conditions.is_a? Hash
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          7
          
                    operator, values = conditions.first
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          
          
                  else
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          20
          
                    operator = current_operator
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          20
          
                    values = conditions
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          
          
                  end
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          
          
            
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          27
          
                  if values.is_a?(Array)
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          10
          
                    case operator.to_sym
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          
          
                    when :or
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          6
          
                      with(key).any_of(values)
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          
          
                    when :and
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          4
          
                      with(key).all_of(values)
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          
          
                    else
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          
          
                      raise Exception.new("Expected operator (:and, :or)")
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          
          
                    end
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          
          
                  else
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          17
          
                    if values.match(/(.+)\*$/)
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          1
          
                      with(key).starting_with($1)
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          
          
                    else
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          16
          
                      with(key, to_proper_value(key, values))
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          
          
                    end
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
                  end
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          
          
                end
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          
          
              end
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          
          
            
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          
          
            end
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          
          
          end
        
      407.

              def self.generate_activity(time=Time.now)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                site_activity_date = time.to_date
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                user_activities = UserActivity.gt(created_at: time-12.hours).lte(created_at: time)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                attributes = {user_sets: 0, search: 0, records: 0}
        
      31.

      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                user_activities.each do |user_activity|
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  [:user_sets, :search, :records].each do |field|
        
      34. 
      
        
    34.

      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                # The date stored is yesterday's date since the activity corresponds to the day before.
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                attributes[:date] = site_activity_date
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                site_activity = new(attributes)

                site_activity.source_clicks = SourceActivity.get_source_clicks || 0

      44.

                site_activity.calculate_total

      47.

              end

      49.

              def self.activities 
        
      50.

                self.fields.keys - IMPLICIT_FIELDS
        
      51.

              end
        
      52.

      53.

              def calculate_total
        
      54. 
      
        
    54.

    55.

            def serializable_hash

      9.

          1
          
            class IndexSourceWorker
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
              @queue = :index_source
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
              def self.perform(source_id, date=nil)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          3
          
                if date.present?
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                  cursor = Record.where(:'fragments.source_id' => source_id, :updated_at.gt => Time.parse(date))
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                else
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          2
          
                  cursor = Record.where(:'fragments.source_id' => source_id)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          3
          
                in_chunks(cursor.where(status: "active")) do |records|
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                  Sunspot.index(records)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          3
          
                in_chunks(cursor.where(status: "deleted")) do |records|
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  Sunspot.remove(records)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
              def self.in_chunks(cursor, &block)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          7
          
                total = cursor.count
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          7
          
                start = 0
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          7
          
                chunk_size = 10000
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          7
          
                while start < total
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          3
          
                  records = cursor.limit(chunk_size).skip(start)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          3
          
                  yield records
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          3
          
                  start += chunk_size
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
            end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          end
        
      40.

              def self.perform(sunspot_method, object = nil)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          3
          
                sunspot_method = sunspot_method.to_sym
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          3
          
                object = object.with_indifferent_access if object.is_a? Hash
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          3
          
                Rails.logger.level = 1 unless Rails.env.development?
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                    
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          3
          
                session = Sunspot.session
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          3
          
                Sunspot.session = Sunspot::Rails.build_session
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          3
          
                case sunspot_method
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                when :index
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  self.index(self.find_all(object[:class], object[:id]))
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                when :remove
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  self.remove(self.find_all(object[:class], object[:id]))
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                when :remove_all
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                  self.remove_all(object)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                when :commit_if_dirty
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  self.commit_if_dirty
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                when :commit_if_delete_dirty
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  self.commit_if_delete_dirty
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                when :commit
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  self.commit
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                else
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                  raise "Error: undefined protocol for IndexWorker: #{sunspot_method} (#{objects})"
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          3
          
                Sunspot.session = session
        
      37.

              def self.remove_all(klass = nil)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                klass = klass.constantize unless klass.nil?
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                Sunspot.remove_all(klass)
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
            
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
              def self.commit
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                begin
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                  # on production, use autocommit in solrconfig.xml 
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                  # or commitWithin whenever sunspot supports it
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                  sleep(20) unless Rails.env.test? # Sleep 20 seconds to wait for other potential jobs being executed in parallel
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                  Sunspot.commit
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                rescue RSolr::Error::Http => e
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                  Rails.logger.error e.inspect
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              end
        
      66.

              end
        
      74.

      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
              def self.find_all(klass, ids)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          3
          
                klass = "SupplejackApi::#{klass}"
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          3
          
                object_ids = *ids
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          3
          
                klass.constantize.where(:id.in => object_ids)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
            end

          1

    spec/helpers/application_helper_spec.rb

    90.91 % covered

    11 relevant lines. 10 lines covered and 1 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'spec_helper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
          module SupplejackApi
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
            describe ApplicationHelper do
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
              def label(string)
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                safe_join([string, content_tag(:span)])
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              end
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
              describe '#extract_sort_info' do
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                it 'returns the column and direction from the order param' do
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          2
          
                  helper.stub(:params) { {order: 'name_asc'} }

    120. 
          1
          
                  it 'returns true when priority is 0' do
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                    fragment.priority = 0
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                    fragment.primary?.should be_truthy
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                  it 'returns false when priority is 1' do
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                    fragment.priority = 1
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
                    fragment.primary?.should be_falsey
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                  end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                describe '#clear_attributes' do
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          2
          
                  let(:concept) { FactoryGirl.create(:concept) }
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          2
          
                  let(:fragment) { concept.fragments.create(gender: 'male') }
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                  it 'clears the existing gender' do
        
      136.

          1
          
                    fragment.clear_attributes
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
                    fragment.gender.should be_nil
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                  end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                end
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                describe '#update_from_harvest' do
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
                  it 'updates the label with the value' do
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({label: 'John Smith'})
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
                    fragment.label.should eq 'John Smith'
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                  end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
                  it 'handles nil values' do
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest(nil)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                  end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
                  it 'ignores invalid fields' do
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({invalid_field: 'http://yahoo.com'})
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
                    fragment['invalid_field'].should be_nil
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                  end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          1
          
                  it 'stores uniq values for each field' do
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({isRelatedTo: ['Jim', 'Bob', 'Jim']})
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                    fragment.isRelatedTo.should eq ['Jim', 'Bob']
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                  end
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                  it 'updates the updated_at even if the attributes didn\'t change' do
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
                    new_time = Time.now + 1.day
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
                    Timecop.freeze(new_time) do
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
                      fragment.update_from_harvest({})
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
                      fragment.updated_at.to_i.should eq(new_time.to_i)
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                    end
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                  end
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
                  it 'uses the attribute setters for strings' do
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                    fragment.should_receive('label=').with('John Smith')
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({:label => 'John Smith'})
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                  end
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
                  it 'uses the attribute setters for Arrays' do
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                    fragment.should_receive('isRelatedTo=').with(['Jim', 'Bob'])
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({:isRelatedTo => ['Jim', 'Bob']})
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                  end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
                  it 'stores the first element in the array for non array fields' do
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({label: ['John Smith', 'Jim Bob']})
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                    fragment.label.should eq 'John Smith'
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                  end
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          1
          
                  it 'should set the source_id' do
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({source_id: ['census']})
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                    fragment.source_id.should eq 'census'
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                  end
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
            end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          end
        
      194.

          1

    112. 
          1
          
                    fragment3 = record.fragments.create(priority: 3)

    113. 
          1

          1

          1

          1

      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({name: ['John Smith', 'Jim Bob']})
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
                    fragment.name.should eq 'John Smith'
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                  end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                  it 'should set the source_id' do
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                    fragment.update_from_harvest({source_id: ['census']})
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
                    fragment.source_id.should eq 'census'
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                  end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
            end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          end
        
      194.

              describe '.role_collection_restrictions' do

          2

          2

      23.

          3

          3
          
                let(:no_restriction) { double(:no_restriction, record_restrictions: nil) }

          1
          
              def query_fields_for_search
        
      45.

          4
          
                @session.searches.last.last.instance_variable_get(:@query).to_params[:qf]

          1

          1

                end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
                it 'converts the string true to a real true' do

    191. 
          1

    192. 
          1

    193. 
          1

    194. 
          
          
                end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
                it 'converts the string false to a real false' do
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                  @search.options[:and] = {nz_citizen: 'false'}
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                  @search.execute_solr_search
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                  @session.should have_search_params(:with, :nz_citizen, false)
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                it 'executes a prefix query when a star(*) is at the end of the value' do
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                  @search.options[:and] = {name: 'John*'}
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
                  @search.execute_solr_search
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  @session.should have_search_params(:with, Proc.new {
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                    with(:name).starting_with('John')
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                  })
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                end
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                it 'ignores a prefix query if the star(*) is not at the end' do
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                  @search.options[:and] = {name: '*John'}
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
                  @search.execute_solr_search
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                  @session.should have_search_params(:with, :name, '*John')
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                end
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          1
          
                it 'should return results matching any of the facet values' do

          1
          
                  it 'queries for all of given facet' do

          1

          1

      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          1
          
                  it 'queries for records with name "John"' do
        
      387.

          1

    388. 
          1
          
                    @search.execute_solr_search
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          1
          
                    facet_query_params.should eq('name_s:John')

                  end
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          
          
          
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          1
          
                  it 'queries for records without name "James"' do

          1

          1

      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          1

      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          
          
                  end
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          
          
          
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          1
          
                  it 'correctly reads a "false" value' do

          1

                  end
        
      403.

      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          1
          
                  it 'queries for records with category Images and Videos' do
        
      405.

          1

          1

    407. 
          1

      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          
          
                  end
        
      409.

                end
        
      410.

    spec/models/supplejack_api/record_spec.rb

    99.05 % covered

          require 'spec_helper'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10.

          1
          
          module SupplejackApi
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
            describe Record do
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
              let(:record) { FactoryGirl.build(:record, record_id: 1234) }
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
              describe '#custom_find' do
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                before(:each) do
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          14
          
                  @record = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 54321)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          14
          
                  @record.stub(:find_next_and_previous_records).and_return(nil)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                it 'should search for a record via its record_id' do

          1

      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                it 'should search for a record via its ObjectId (MongoDB autoassigned id)' do
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  Record.custom_find(@record.id).should eq(@record)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                it 'should raise a error when a record is not found' do
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          2
          
                  expect { Record.custom_find(111) }.to raise_error(Mongoid::Errors::DocumentNotFound)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                it "shouldn't call find when the mongo id is invalid" do
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  Record.should_not_receive(:find)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          2
          
                  expect { Record.custom_find('1234567abc') }.to raise_error(Mongoid::Errors::DocumentNotFound)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                it 'should find next and previous records' do
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  @user = double(:user)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  Record.stub_chain(:unscoped, :active, :where, :first).and_return(@record)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  @record.should_receive(:find_next_and_previous_records).with(@user, {text: 'dogs'})
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  Record.custom_find(54321, @user, {text: 'dogs'})
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                [Sunspot::UnrecognizedFieldError, Timeout::Error, Errno::ECONNREFUSED, Errno::ECONNRESET].each do |error_klass|

    45. 
          4
          
                  it 'should rescue from a #{error_klass}' do
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          4

      47.

    48. 
          4

      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                end
        
      51.

              describe '#find_multiple' do
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
                before(:each) do
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          6
          
                  @record = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 54321)
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
                it 'should find multiple records by numeric id' do
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                  r1 = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 999)
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                  r2 = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 998)
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
                  Record.find_multiple([999, 998]).should include(r1, r2)
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                  Record.find_multiple([999, 998]).length.should eq(2)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                end
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
                it 'should find multiple records by ObjectId' do
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
                  r1 = FactoryGirl.create(:record)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
                  r2 = FactoryGirl.create(:record)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          1
          
                  Record.find_multiple([r1.id, r2.id]).should include(r1, r2)
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
                  Record.find_multiple([r1.id, r2.id]).length.should eq(2)
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
          
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
                it "should find multiple records with ObjectId's and numeric id's" do
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
                  r1 = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 997)
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                  r2 = FactoryGirl.create(:record)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1
          
                  Record.find_multiple([997, r2.id]).should include(r1, r2)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
                  Record.find_multiple([997, r2.id]).length.should eq(2)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                it 'returns an empty array when ids is nil' do
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          1
          
                  Record.find_multiple(nil).should eq []
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                end
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                it 'should not return inactive records' do
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  r1 = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 997, status: 'deleted')
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          1
          
                  r2 = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 667, status: 'active')
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
                  records = Record.find_multiple([997, 667]).to_a
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                  records.should_not include(r1)
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
                  records.should include(r2)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                it 'returns the records in the same order as requested' do
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                  r1 = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 1, created_at: Time.now-10.days)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
                  r2 = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 2, created_at: Time.now)
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          1
          
                  records = Record.find_multiple([2,1]).to_a
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                  records.first.should eq r2
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              end
        
      128. 
      
        
    128.

          1
          
              def mock_hits(primary_keys=[])
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                primary_keys.map {|pk| double(:hit, primary_key: pk.to_s )}
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
              end
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
          
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
              # describe 'harvest_job_id=()' do

      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
              #     record.harvest_job.should eq(harvest_job)
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
              #   end
        
      236.

              #   it 'returns nil for a non existent harvest job' do

          1
          
              describe '#active?' do
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
                before(:each) do
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          2
          
                  @record = FactoryGirl.build(:record)
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
                end
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
          
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
                it 'returns true when state is active' do
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
                  @record.status = 'active'
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
                  @record.active?.should be_truthy
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
                end
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
          
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
                it 'returns false when state is deleted' do
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          1
          
                  @record.status = 'deleted'
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
                  @record.active?.should be_falsey
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
                end
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
              end
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
          
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          1
          
              describe '#should_index?' do
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
                before(:each) do
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          2
          
                  @record = FactoryGirl.build(:record)
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
                end
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
          
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
                it 'returns false when active? is false' do
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          2
          
                  @record.stub(:active?) { false }
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
                  @record.should_index?.should be_falsey
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
                end
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
          
        
      269.

          1
          
                it 'returns true when active? is true' do

          2
          
                  @record.stub(:active?) { true }

          1
          
                  @record.should_index?.should be_truthy

          1
          
              class ExampleSchema
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                include SchemaDefinition
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                namespace :dc, url: 'http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/'
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                string :title,                  search_boost: 10, search_as: [:fulltext], namespace: :dc, namespace_field: :creator
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                string :display_collection
        
      20.

          1
          
                string :primary_collection,     multi_value: true,  search_as: [:filter]

    21. 
          1
          
                boolean :is_natlib_record,                          search_as: [:filter]
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                integer :year do
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                  multi_value true
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  store false
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  search_as [:filter]
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                  search_value do |record|
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    record.date.map { |date| Date.parse(date).year rescue nil}.compact if record.date
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                end

    spec/models/supplejack_api/search_spec.rb

    100.0 % covered

    139 relevant lines. 139 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          # The majority of the Supplejack API code is Crown copyright (C) 2014, New Zealand Government,
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          # and is licensed under the GNU General Public License, version 3.
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # One component is a third party component. See https://github.com/DigitalNZ/supplejack_api for details.
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          #
        
      5. 
      
        
    5.

          # the Department of Internal Affairs. http://digitalnz.org/supplejack

            describe Search do

          1
          
            	before {
        
      13.

          36

          36
          
                @session = Sunspot.session

            	describe '#facet_list' do
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
            		before {
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          2
          
                  @search = RecordSearch.new
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          2
          
                  @search.stub(:model_class) { Record }
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                }
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                it 'should return a array of facets' do
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  @search.options[:facets] = 'name, address'
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  @search.facet_list.should eq [:name, :address]
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1

    32. 
          1

      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  @search.facet_list.should eq [:name, :address]
        
      34. 
      
        
    34.

          	  describe '#query_fields' do
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                it 'returns nil when no query fields were specified' do
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  @search = Search.new
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
                  @search.query_fields.should be_nil
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                it 'returns the query fields from the params' do
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                  @search = Search.new(query_fields: [:collection])
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                  @search.query_fields.should eq([:collection])
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                it 'supports the query_fields as comma separated string' do
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
                  @search = Search.new(query_fields: 'collection, creator, publisher')
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
                  @search.query_fields.should eq([:collection, :creator, :publisher])
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                end
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
          
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                it 'converts an array of strings to symbols' do
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                  @search = Search.new(query_fields: ['collection','creator'])
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
                  @search.query_fields.should eq([:collection, :creator])
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                end
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
                it 'returns nil when query_fields is an empty string' do
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
                  @search = Search.new(query_fields: '')
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                  @search.query_fields.should be_nil
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                it 'returns nil when query_fields is an empty array' do
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                  @search = Search.new(query_fields: [])
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                  @search.query_fields.should be_nil
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                end
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              end
        
      97.

    98. 
          1
          
              describe '#extract_range' do
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
                it 'extracts the dates from [1900 TO 2000] and return a range' do
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                  @search.extract_range('[1900 TO 2000]').should eq(1900..2000)
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                end
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
          
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
                it 'doesn\'t match non numbers' do
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                  @search.extract_range('[asdasd TO asdads]').should eq '[asdasd TO asdads]'
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                end
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
          
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
                it 'returns the current value if is not a range and converts it to int' do
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1
          
                  @search.extract_range('1900').should eq 1900
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                end
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
              end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
          
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
               describe '#to_proper_value' do
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                it 'returns false for "false" string' do
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  @search.to_proper_value('active?', 'false').should be_falsey
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                it 'returns true for "true" string' do
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
                  @search.to_proper_value('active?', 'true').should be_truthy
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                it 'returns nil if is a "nil" string' do
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                  @search.to_proper_value('active?', 'nil').should be_nil
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                it 'returns nil if is a "null" string' do
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  @search.to_proper_value('active?', 'null').should be_nil
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                end
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
          
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
                it 'returns the value unchanged' do
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
                  @search.to_proper_value('label', 'Black').should eq('Black')
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                it 'should strip any white space' do
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  @search.to_proper_value('label', ' Black Label ').should eq('Black Label')
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              end
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
              describe '#text' do
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                it 'downcases the text string' do
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
                  Search.new(text: 'McDowall').text.should eq 'mcdowall'
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                ['AND', 'OR', 'NOT'].each do |operator|
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          3
          
                  it "downcases everything except the #{operator} operators" do
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          3
          
                    Search.new(text: "McDowall #{operator} Dogs").text.should eq "mcdowall #{operator} dogs"
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                  end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                end
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
              end

              describe '#solr_search_object' do
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
                it 'memoizes the solr search object' do
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                  sunspot_mock = double(:solr).as_null_object
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
                  @search.should_receive(:execute_solr_search).once.and_return(sunspot_mock)
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_search_object
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_search_object.should eq(sunspot_mock)
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                it 'sets the solr request parameters when debug=true' do
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
                  @search.options[:debug] = 'true'
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          2
          
                  @search.stub(:execute_solr_search) { double(:solr_request, query: double(:query, to_params: {param1: 1})) }
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_search_object
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_request_params.should eq({:param1 => 1})
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
                it "doesn't set the solr request parameters" do
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          2
          
                  @search.stub(:execute_solr_search) { double(:solr_request, query: double(:query, to_params: {param1: 1})) }
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_search_object
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_request_params.should be_nil
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                it 'returns a empty hash when solr request fails' do
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
                  @search.options[:debug] = 'true'
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          2
          
                  @search.stub(:execute_solr_search) { {} }
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_search_object.should eq({})
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                end
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              end
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
          
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
              describe '#solr_error_message' do
        
      179.

          1
          
                before {
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                  @error = double(:error, response: {status: 400, body: 'Solr error'})

          2
          
                  @error.stub(:parse_solr_error_response) { 'Solr error' }

                }
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          1

          1

                end
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              end

              describe '#method_missing' do
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
          	    it 'delegates any missing method to the solr_search_object' do
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
          	      sso = double(:sso, something_missing: [], hits: [])
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
          	      @search.stub(:solr_search_object).and_return(sso)
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
          	      sso.should_receive(:something_missing)
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
          	      @search.something_missing
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          	    end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
          	    it 'returns nil when solr request failed' do
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
          	      @search.stub(:solr_search_object).and_return({})
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
          	      @search.something_missing.should be_nil
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
          	    end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          	  end
        
      202. 
      
        
    202.

          1
          
          	  describe '#solr_error_message' do
        
      204.

          1
          
                before(:each) do
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  @error = double(:error, response: {status: 400, body: 'Solr error'})
        
      206.

          2
          
                  @error.stub(:parse_solr_error_response) { 'Solr error' }
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                end
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          
        
      209.

          1
