          1
          
                  @search.solr_error_message(@error).should eq({:title => '400 Bad Request', :body => 'Solr error'})

                end
        
      212.

          1
          
                it 'memoizes the solr search object' do
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          1
          
                  sunspot_mock = double(:solr).as_null_object
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
                  @search.should_receive(:execute_solr_search).once.and_return(sunspot_mock)
        
      218.

          1
          
                  @search.solr_search_object

          1

                end
        
      221.

      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1

          1

      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          2

          1

          1

      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                end
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
          
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
                it "doesn't set the solr request parameters" do
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          2
          
                  @search.stub(:execute_solr_search) { double(:solr_request, query: double(:query, to_params: {param1: 1})) }
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_search_object
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_request_params.should be_nil
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
                end
        
      234.

      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                it 'returns a empty hash when solr request fails' do
        
      236.

          1
          
                  @search.options[:debug] = 'true'
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          2
          
                  @search.stub(:execute_solr_search) { {} }
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
                  @search.solr_search_object.should eq({})
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                end
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
              end
        
      241.

      244.

    spec/models/supplejack_api/set_item_spec.rb

    100.0 % covered

    46 relevant lines. 46 lines covered and 0 lines missed.

          # Supplejack was created by DigitalNZ at the National Library of NZ and 
        
      6.

          # the Department of Internal Affairs. http://digitalnz.org/supplejack
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
          require 'spec_helper'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10.

                      record.contact.should eq []

    spec/models/supplejack_api/support/searchable_spec.rb

    100.0 % covered

    36 relevant lines. 36 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          # The majority of the Supplejack API code is Crown copyright (C) 2014, New Zealand Government, 
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          # and is licensed under the GNU General Public License, version 3.
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # One component is a third party component. See https://github.com/DigitalNZ/supplejack_api for details. 
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          # 
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # Supplejack was created by DigitalNZ at the National Library of NZ and 
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          # the Department of Internal Affairs. http://digitalnz.org/supplejack
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
          require 'spec_helper'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
          module SupplejackApi
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
            module Support
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
              describe Searchable do
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                let(:record) { FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 1234) }
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                let(:fragment) { record.fragments.create({nz_citizen: false }) }
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                before do
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          10
          
                  RecordSchema.stub(:fields) do
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                    {
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                      name: double(:field, name: :name, type: :string, search_as: [:filter]).as_null_object,
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                      age: double(:field, name: :age, type: :integer, search_as: [:filter]).as_null_object,

    68. 
          1
          
                it "removes html tags from the tags" do
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
                  user_set.tags = ["Dogs", "<b>Cats</b>"]
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                  user_set.strip_html_tags
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
                  user_set.tags.should eq ["Dogs", "Cats"]
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
            end
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76.

          1

    79. 
          1
          
                user_set.save
        
      80. 
      
        
    80.

    82.

          5
          
                @user_set.save

    103.

      104.

            describe "#public_sets" do
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
              before :each do
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          5
          
                @set1 = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, privacy: "public")
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          5
          
                @set2 = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, privacy: "hidden")
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131.

    132. 
          1

    139.

      140.

    143. 
          
          
              end

    144.

          1

          1

    147. 
          2

      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                proxy.should_receive(:page).with(1)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
                UserSet.public_sets(page: "")
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
              end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1

      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1

    154. 
          2

    155. 
          1
          
                proxy.stub_chain(:desc, :page)

    156. 
          1

      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
                UserSet.public_sets

          1
          
            describe "#featured_sets" do
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
              before :each do
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          3
          
                @record = FactoryGirl.create(:record, status: "active", record_id: 1234)
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          3
          
                @set1 = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, privacy: "public", featured: true, featured_at: Time.now - 4.hours)
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          3
          
                @set1.set_items.create(record_id: 1234)
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          3
          
                @set2 = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, privacy: "hidden", featured: true)
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          3
          
                @set2.set_items.create(record_id: 1234)
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          3
          
                @set3 = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, privacy: "public", featured: false)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          3
          
                @set3.set_items.create(record_id: 1234)
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1

          1

      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
              it "orders the sets based on when they were added" do
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1

          1

          1

      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
              end
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1

      187.

      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
            describe "#update_attributes_and_embedded" do
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
              it "updates the set attributes" do
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(name: "New dog", description: "New dog", privacy: "hidden")
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
                user_set.name.should eq "New dog"
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
                user_set.description.should eq "New dog"
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
                user_set.privacy.should eq "hidden"
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
              end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
              it "updates the embedded set items" do
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(records: [{"record_id" => "13", "position" => "2"}])
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.size.should eq 1
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.first.record_id.should eq 13
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.first.position.should eq 2
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
              end
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
              it "ignores invalid attributes" do
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(something: "Bad attribute")
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
                user_set[:something].should be_nil
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
              end
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
              it "ignores invalid set items but still saves the set" do
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(records: [{"record_id" => "13", "position" => "1"}, {"position" => "2"}])
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.size.should eq 1
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.first.record_id.should eq 13
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.first.position.should eq 1
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
              end
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
          
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
              it "ignores set_items when the format is incorrect" do
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(records: {"record_id" => "13", "position" => "1"})
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.size.should eq 0
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
              end
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
          
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          1
          
              it "regular users should not be able to change the :featured attribute" do
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
                regular_user = FactoryGirl.create(:user, role: "developer")
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
                user_set = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, user_id: regular_user.id, featured: false)
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded({featured: true}, regular_user)
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          1
          
                user_set.featured.should be_falsey
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
              end
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
          
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
              it "should allow admins to change the :featured attribute" do
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          1
          
                admin_user = FactoryGirl.create(:user, role: "admin")
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                user_set = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, user_id: admin_user.id)
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded({featured: true}, admin_user)
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
                user_set.featured.should be_truthy
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
              end
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
          
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          1
          
              it "should update the featured_at when the featured attribute is updated" do
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
                admin_user = FactoryGirl.create(:user, role: "admin")
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
                user_set = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, user_id: admin_user.id)
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
                Timecop.freeze(Time.now) do
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
                  user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded({featured: true}, admin_user)
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                  user_set.reload
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          1
          
                  user_set.featured_at.to_i.should eq Time.now.to_i
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
                end
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
              end
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
          
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
              it "should not update the featured_at if the featured hasn't changed" do
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          1
          
                admin_user = FactoryGirl.create(:user, role: "admin")
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
                time = Time.now-1.day
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          1
          
                user_set = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, user_id: admin_user.id, featured: true, featured_at: time)
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
                Timecop.freeze(Time.now) do
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
                  user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded({featured: true}, admin_user)
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
                  user_set.reload
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
                  user_set.featured_at.to_i.should eq time.to_i
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
                end
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
              end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
              it "removes the set from the featured" do
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
                admin_user = FactoryGirl.create(:user, role: "admin")
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
                time = Time.now-1.day
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
                user_set = FactoryGirl.create(:user_set, user_id: admin_user.id, featured: true, featured_at: time)
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded({featured: false}, admin_user)
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
                user_set.featured.should be_falsey
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
              end
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
          
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          1
          
              it "initializes the set_items through the user_set" do
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
                item = user_set.set_items.build(record_id: 13)
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          2
          
                user_set.set_items.should_receive(:find_or_initialize_by).with({record_id: "13"}) { item }
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(records: [{"record_id" => "13", "position" => nil}])
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
              end
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
          
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          1
          
              it "can replace the set items" do
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
                user_set.save
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.create(record_id: 13)
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(records: [{"record_id" => "13", "position" => nil}])
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.size.should eq 1
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.first.record_id.should eq 13
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
              end
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
          
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          1
          
              it "should not replace the set items if :records is nil" do
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          1
          
                user_set.save
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.create(record_id: 13)
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
                user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(records: nil)
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          1
          
                user_set.reload
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.count.should eq 1
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
              end
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
          
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          1
          
              it "raises a error when then records array format is not correct" do
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          2
          
                expect { user_set.update_attributes_and_embedded(records: [1,2]) }.to raise_error(UserSet::WrongRecordsFormat)
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
              end
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
            end
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
          
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
            describe "#calculate_count" do
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
              it "returns 2 when there are 2 active set items" do
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          2
          
                user_set.stub(:records){[double(:record), double(:record)]}
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          1
          
                user_set.calculate_count
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
                user_set.count.should eq(2)
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
              end
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
            end
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
          
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
            describe "record_status" do
        
      308.

            describe "#items_with_records" do

          1
          
              it "returns an array of set items with record information" do

    417. 
          1

      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          1
          
                fragment = record.fragments.create( title: "Dog", description: "Ugly dog", display_content_partner: "ATL", display_collection: "Tapuhi", large_thumbnail_attributes: {url: "goo.gle/large"}, thumbnail_attributes: {url: "goo.gle/small"})

    419. 
          1

    421. 
          
          
              end
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
          
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          1
          
              it "removes set items which don't have a corresponding record" do
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.build(record_id: 5, position: 1)

    425. 
          1

      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          
          
              end
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          
          
          
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          1
          
              it "returns items_with_records sorted by position" do
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          1
          
                FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 5)
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          1
          
                FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 6)
        
      431. 
      
        
    431. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.build(record_id: 5, position: 2)
        
      432. 
      
        
    432. 
          1

    433. 
          1
          
                user_set.items_with_records[0].record_id.should eq 6
        
      434. 
      
        
    434. 
          1
          
                user_set.items_with_records[1].record_id.should eq 5
        
      435. 
      
        
    435. 
          
          
              end
        
      436. 
      
        
    436. 
          
          
          
        
      437. 
      
        
    437. 
          1
          
              it "only fetches the amount of records specified" do
        
      438. 
      
        
    438. 
          1
          
                record = FactoryGirl.create(:record, record_id: 6)
        
      439. 
      
        
    439. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.build(record_id: 5, position: 2)
        
      440. 
      
        
    440. 
          1
          
                user_set.set_items.build(record_id: 6, position: 1)
        
      441. 
      
        
    441. 
          2
          
                user_set.should_receive(:records).with(1) { [record] }
        
      442. 
      
        
    442. 
          1
          
                user_set.items_with_records(1).size.should eq 1
        
      443. 
      
        
    443. 
          
          
              end
        
      444. 
      
        
    444. 
          
          
            end

    spec/routing/concepts_routing_spec.rb

    100.0 % covered

    6 relevant lines. 6 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          # The majority of the Supplejack API code is Crown copyright (C) 2014, New Zealand Government,
        
      2.

    3. 
          
          
          # One component is a third party component. See https://github.com/DigitalNZ/supplejack_api for details.
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          #
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # Supplejack was created by DigitalNZ at the National Library of NZ and
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          # the Department of Internal Affairs. http://digitalnz.org/supplejack
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
          require 'spec_helper'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
          module SupplejackApi
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1

    35 relevant lines. 35 lines covered and 0 lines missed.

          1
          
          require 'spec_helper'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
          module SupplejackApi
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
            describe HarvesterConstraint do
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          9
          
              let(:constraint) { HarvesterConstraint.new }
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
              describe "#forwarded_ips" do
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                it "returns a single ip address in the X-FORWARDED-FOR header" do
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  request = double(:request, :env => {"HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR" => "192.122.171.246"})
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                  constraint.forwarded_ips(request).should eq ["192.122.171.246"]
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                it "returns multiple ip addresses in the X-FORWARDED-FOR header" do
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                  request = double(:request, :env => {"HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR" => "192.122.171.246, 192.122.171.234"})
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  constraint.forwarded_ips(request).should eq ["192.122.171.246", "192.122.171.234"]
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                it "returns multiple ip addresses in the X-FORWARDED-FOR header without spaces" do
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                  request = double(:request, :env => {"HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR" => "192.122.171.246,192.122.171.234"})
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  constraint.forwarded_ips(request).should eq ["192.122.171.246", "192.122.171.234"]
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
              describe "#matches?" do
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                context "forwarded_ips is empty" do
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  it "returns true when the remote_ip is one of the allowed ips" do
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                    request = double(:request, :env => {"HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR" => nil}, :remote_ip => "127.0.0.1")
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                    constraint.matches?(request).should be_truthy
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  it "returns false when the remote_ip is not allowed" do
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                    request = double(:request, :env => {"HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR" => nil}, :remote_ip => "192.1.1.1")
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                    constraint.matches?(request).should be_falsey
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                context "with some forwarded_ips" do
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                  it "returns true when the remote_ip and the forwarded_ips are allowed" do
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                    request = double(:request, :env => {"HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR" => "192.1.1.0"}, :remote_ip => "193.1.1.0")
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                    constraint.instance_variable_set("@ips", ["192.1.1.0", "193.1.1.0"])
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                    constraint.matches?(request).should be_truthy
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                  it "returns false when the remote_ip is not allowed" do
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                    request = double(:request, :env => {"HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR" => "192.1.1.0"}, :remote_ip => "222.1.1.0")
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                    constraint.instance_variable_set("@ips", ["192.1.1.0", "193.1.1.0"])
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
                    constraint.matches?(request).should be_falsey
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  it "returns false when any of the forwarded_ips are not allowed" do
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                    request = double(:request, :env => {"HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR" => "192.1.1.0, 222.1.1.0"}, :remote_ip => "193.1.1.0")
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                    constraint.instance_variable_set("@ips", ["192.1.1.0", "193.1.1.0", "194.1.1.0"])
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                    constraint.matches?(request).should be_falsey
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  end
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
          
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
            end
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          end

          2

          3

    94.23 % covered

          1
          
            describe RecordSerializer do
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
              before(:each) do
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          32
          
                RecordSchema.stub(:roles) { double(:developer).as_null_object }
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
              def record_hash(attributes={}, method=nil, options={})
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                record_fields = Record.fields.keys
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                record_attributes = Hash[attributes.map {|k,v| [k,v] if record_fields.include?(k.to_s)}.compact]
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                attributes.delete_if {|k,v| record_fields.include?(k.to_s) }
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                @record = FactoryGirl.build(:record, record_attributes)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                @record.fragments.build(attributes)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                @serializer = RecordSerializer.new(@record, options)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                if method
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                  @serializer.send(method)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                else
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  @serializer.as_json[:record]
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
              def serializer(options={}, attributes={})
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          24
          
                record_fields = Record.fields.keys
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          32
          
                record_attributes = Hash[attributes.map {|k,v| [k,v] if record_fields.include?(k.to_s)}.compact]
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          32
          
                attributes.delete_if {|k,v| record_fields.include?(k.to_s) }
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          24
          
                @record = FactoryGirl.build(:record, record_attributes)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          24
          
                @record.fragments.build(attributes)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          24
          
                @serializer = RecordSerializer.new(@record, options)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
              describe '#as_json' do
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          9
          
                let(:record) { FactoryGirl.build(:record) }
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          9
          
                let(:serializer) { RecordSerializer.new(record) }
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                [:next_record, :previous_record, :next_page, :previous_page].each do |attribute|
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          4
          
                  it "should include #{attribute} when present" do
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          4
          
                    record.send("#{attribute}=", 2)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          4
          
                    serializer.as_json[:record][attribute].should eq 2
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          4

      56. 
      
        
    56.

      57. 
      
        
    57.

      58.

    spec/serializers/supplejack_api/search_serializer_spec.rb

    100.0 % covered

    34 relevant lines. 34 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          # The majority of the Supplejack API code is Crown copyright (C) 2014, New Zealand Government, 
        
      2.

          # and is licensed under the GNU General Public License, version 3.

          # One component is a third party component. See https://github.com/DigitalNZ/supplejack_api for details.

      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # Supplejack was created by DigitalNZ at the National Library of NZ and 
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          # the Department of Internal Affairs. http://digitalnz.org/supplejack
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
          require 'spec_helper'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
          module SupplejackApi
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
            describe SearchSerializer do
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
              def facet_row(value, count)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          45
          
                double(:facet_row, value: value, count: count)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
              def facet_objects
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                [
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  double(:facet, name: :full_name ,rows: [ 
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    facet_row('Nick Miller', 123), 
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                    facet_row('Winston Bishop', 10) 
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          9
          
                  ]),
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                  double(:facet, name: :coffee ,rows: [ 
        
      24. 
      
        
    24.
